content:
Ready to make a fishing rod?
You should just need <color=#97c344>5 branches</color>.
Try shaking trees continuously, if one doesn't drop anything...

Let's try a different tree.
Now that you've learned crafting, you can use the DIY Bench
to make all sorts of interesting things.

Hmm, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
Hello there!
How's your new life going?
